data.loader

Class FileLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.loader.FileLoader

  • public class FileLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a way of reading activity events provided by a fitness tracking device. The activity data needs to be in a CSV format consisting of date, time, heart rate, latitude, longitude, and altitude.
    Author:
    Sam, James

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileLoader()
      creates a file loader with the default csv file, for testing purposes
      FileLoader(java.io.File file)
      Creates a FileLoader with a particular input file

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EventContainer getEventContainer()
      returns the event container which holds all the dataPoints
      java.io.InputStream getStream()
      Gets the input stream
      boolean isValidLine(java.lang.String line)
      checks that the data line from the csv file if valid i.e that it has all the required fields and they are an appropriate value
      void load()
      Reads a CSV file and creates a new event at each #start add all following data points to the event

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
